Cars sold as an 'Italian jewel' must be made in Italy, PM tells StellantisA car being sold as an "Italian jewel" needs to be made in Italy, Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said, telling lawmakers that Fiat's parent company Stellantis has sometimes made choices which were against the country's interests. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 16:15:47 GMT PX373BGJUVLT7L6YBGDCRBIJLU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/cars-sold-an-italian-jewel-must-be-made-italy-pm-tells-stellantis-2024-01-24/Reuters世界欧洲
US Senate panel steps toward seizing Russian assets to help UkraineA U.S. Senate committee approved legislation on Wednesday that would help set the stage for the United States to confiscate Russian assets and hand them over to Ukraine for rebuilding after the destruction of the nearly two-year-long war. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 16:14:32 GMT PZRN2WGJJBJDBKA3LICBUPWVHU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-senate-panel-steps-toward-seizing- Russian-assets-help-ukraine-2024-01-24/Patricia Zengerle世界
Italy to treat 100 Palestinian children in its hospitalsItaly will provide hospital treatment for 100 Palestinian children from Gaza after transporting them by plane and ship in an operation to be launched in the next few days, Defence Minister Guido Crosetto said on Wednesday. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 16:08:11 GMT JHGLIWQEPNJE7HHZJKJMM5YGV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/italy-treat-100-palestinian-children-its-hospitals-2024-01-24/Reuters世界
Namibia's president Geingob to travel to US for cancer treatmentNamibia's President Hage Geingob will travel to the United States on Wednesday to undergo cancer treatment, the presidency has announced. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 16:05:26 GMT 7G3I36M2INNPDKT7YOIAUXHB2Q https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/namibias-president-geingob-travel-us-cancer-treatment-2024-01-24/Reuters世界非洲
Senator Warren, other Democrats ask Commerce to extend gun export pause, increase oversight - letterCongressional Democrats, including Senator Elizabeth Warren, again asked the U.S. Commerce Department to curb assault weapon exports and increase oversight of gun exports after a Trump-era rule change eased firearms export laws, according to a letter sent on Tuesday and seen by Reuters. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 15:54:33 GMT KGLY3C5G4FJSXM47ICKNBLQPQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/senator-warren-other-democrats-ask-commerce-extend-gun-export-pause-increase-2024-01-24/Mike Stone世界美国
More than 40 killed in artisanal mine collapse in southwest Mali - mines ministryMore than 40 artisanal gold miners were killed in southwest Mali last week after the shaft they were working in collapsed, Mali's mines ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 15:47:03 GMT 7RP4SK3ODZNNLGCN33USNTTOQA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/more-than-40-killed-artisanal-mine-collapse-southwest-mali-mines-ministry-2024-01-24/Reuters世界非洲
With government relocated, Egypt set to unveil overhaul of downtown CairoEgypt's sovereign wealth fund is finalising a masterplan to revamp Cairo's historic centre now that government ministries have largely moved to a new capital to the east, and hopes to break ground on the project within months, its chief executive said. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 15:10:49 GMT GJK677FX7NOIRJQM6DCGFAP7XY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/with-government-re located-egypt-set-unveil-overhaul-downtown-cairo-2024-01-24/Patrick Werr世界非洲
US Navy says USS John Finn conducted transit in Taiwan StraitThe United States Navy said its USS John Finn destroyer Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:37:40 GMT RZYAYZVBUZMCHAOAIP2PHK52TM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-navy-says-uss-john-finn-conducted-transit-taiwan-strait-2024-01-24/Reuters世界
Thou shall be a whistleblower but not an anonymous one, new Vatican rules sayThe Vatican, which over the centuries has codified all aspects of faith, morals, doctrine and dissent, on Wednesday announced a new entry - the rights and responsibilities of a whistleblower. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:34:41 GMT 2FLNXG343BKHBLXWYFJDZYZGBI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/thou-shall-be-whistleblower-not-an-anonymous-one-new-vatican-rules-say-2024-01-24/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
Brown, Yale, Columbia among latest to settle financial-aid lawsuitBrown, Yale and Columbia universities have agreed to pay a combined $62 million to resolve a lawsuit that accused them and others of favoring wealthy applicants, pushing total settlements in the case to $118 million. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:28:55 GMT EELAMZ6XENLVVFFG3KIWYFGZLA https://www.reuters.com/legal/brown-yale-columbia-among-latest-settle-financial-aid-lawsuit-2024-01-24/Mike Scarcella可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Shop fire in China's Jiangxi province kills 39, traps othersA fire at a street shop in Xinyu City of Jiangxi Province has killed 39 people and injured nine, Chinese state media and the local government said on Wednesday, adding that some people were still trapped. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 13:11:53 GMT L3CHCN276BJLBIDLDBUF5CSIOE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/fire-street-shop-chinas-jianxi-province-kills-39-several-trapped-2024-01-24/Reuters世界中国
